talk_1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, before you go!


Now that you're nothing but weak spots,
I'm going to kill you real quick, OK?
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, good, no more clothes or weapons,
huh?<sp:5:0:0> I guess you're not a Yiga after all.
I can finally relax a little.
talk_1011:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Kyaaah!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Y-y-<sp:5:0:0>you really scared me!<sp:5:0:0> P-<sp:5:0:0>please
don't frighten people like that!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>It's a good thing you're in your
investigation clothes, or I would have
thought you were in the Yiga Clan!
Wait, those aren't investigation clothes...


<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Eeep! ARE you in the Yiga Clan?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk_1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>I warned you over and over, didn't I?!
<sp:5:0:0>And you just didn't listen! SO rude!
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_01>Is this a joke to you? <sp:5:0:0>Pretending to be
part of our clan is an unforgivable sin!
talk_1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I'm not telling you again!


If you want me to believe you...<sp:5:0:0>prove that
you're not hiding a Yiga uniform under
those clothes and put away the weapons!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_01>This is your last chance! Mess around and
you'll be in for a bruising!
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>D-<sp:5:0:0>don't lie to me! <sp:5:1:0>The Yiga Clan are all
masters of disguise!

They train extra hard to make sure their
disguises are flawless to the naked eye!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_01>If you want me to believe you, then...<sp:5:0:0>
prove you're not hiding any Yiga clothes
under your outfit and ditch the weapons!
<sp:3:0:2:0200>If I see you wearing clothes in my
presence again, <sp:5:0:0>you'll be in big trouble!
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I don't think I've ever seen a <clr:0000>rock pile<clr:ffff> this
big before.
talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease_01>Tch... Have I given myself away?<sp:5:0:0>
I have no other choice, then.
talk_1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>It should be easier than ever to defeat
you now.

Taking off all your armor just because
I asked? You really are a fool.
talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You made it REALLY easy to defeat you.


I mean, taking all your clothes off in a
place like this? Terrible choice.
talk_1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>D-don't lie to me!<sp:5:1:0> The Yiga Clan are
known masters of disguise!

I've heard they train really, really hard to
master the art of deception!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_01>If you want me to believe you, then...<sp:5:0:0>
prove you're not hiding any Yiga clothes
under your outfit!
Wait...<sp:5:0:0> You're not wearing anything.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Huh, OK. <sp:5:0:0>Phew!<sp:5:1:0> But seriously, you
shouldn't scare people like that!
talk_1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> I don't get it.<sp:5:0:0> How'd it get built
up so high?
talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>This <clr:0000>rock pile is gigantic<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> I've seen them
before,<sp:5:0:0> but never one this big.

Though I still saw <clr:0000>weapons on top<clr:ffff>,
just like the others.
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>You're thinking, "but you can find those
all over the Depths," right?<sp:5:0:0> Sure, but this
one is different. Look how big it is!
That said, like all the others, it DOES have
<clr:0000>weapons at the top<clr:ffff>. But anyway...
talk_1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Well, check out this <clr:0000>huge rock pile<clr:ffff>...


Sure, you can find piles of rocks all over,
but none of them are THIS big, right?
talk_1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Though I still saw <clr:0000>weapons on top<clr:ffff> of it,
just like the others.
